General.Name: Modiin Energy-Limited Partnership
General.Description: Modiin Energy-Limited Partnership engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas assets in the United States and Israel. It holds interests in the Mountainview, GrapeVine, Cassini, and Shideler projects in California; NPB project in Colorado; and Shimshon in Israel. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
